    • Uses of CommitListener in pt.ist.fenixframework

      Methods in pt.ist.fenixframework with parameters of type CommitListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TransactionManager.addCommitListener(CommitListener listener)
      Registers a commit listener, that will be called whenever any Transactionmanaged by this Manager is committed.
      void TransactionManager.removeCommitListener(CommitListener listener)
      Unregisters the given commit listener.
